entry.title: Dang, my site sucks.
entry.content:
So I decided to remake it. All for the best, don’t worry. I grew a little
jealous of everyone and their mother having a website again – I decided to move
my blog (not that anyone was reading it) to be a sub page of my site rather
than the whole thing. That’ll be all for now, but there will be more to follow
Cheers!
entry.summary:
So I decided to remake it. All for the best, don’t worry. I grew a little
jealous of everyone and their mother having a website again
